text: My life is trashI left school for a year at   years old due to health complications  During that time I couldn t make friends by going to school so I tried to make friends online  I met a bad influence  ended up getting sexually abused by the person and ultimately became a sex worker by    I got addicted to drugs and the one year off of school turned into a few more  Drugs during the developmental years coupled with severe trauma has left my brain hardly functioning  I went back to a community college but could never understand anything the teacher was saying  I would fail every assignment and have trouble even waking up to make it to class so I dropped out  I feel brain dead   It was impossible to make friends there anyway  All of the other students talk about looking back on their high school experience  who they re dating  career plans  wanting to move out of their parents house and go to parties etc  I m at a very different place due to my odd circumstances   I m safe now  no more sex work  and I have a wonderfully supportive family  but I can t see a point in going on  Now I have the time to go out to restaurants  see a show  pursue my hobbies  and try to enjoy my life  but whenever I do anything all I can think about is how I m different from everyone around me  When I see a group of teen girls laughing together at the mall I think of how I ll never have that  Sometimes I even begin to cry  It s frustrating because I m the same age as these people yet I have to watch it pass me by  I feel like an old woman looking out through my eyes reminiscing on a childhood I didn t get   Most days when I try to go out and do something it s just miserable  Or my intrusive thoughts cause me to cry in public  On the rare occasion I am happy while out doing something  when I get back home it hits me hard  Great  I did something enjoyable for   hours  now I m going to sit in my room depressed for   hours until I fall asleep  And then repeat I just want to be done for good  Please no more of this
summary: At the age of 14 she left school for a year due to health complications. She met a bad influence, she was sexually abused, she became a sex worker, she got addicted to drugs and she's brain damaged. She dropped out of college because it was impossible to make friends there. She has a supportive family but she doesn't see the point in going on.

text: Will I ever find love as a   ish   male Ik another sad and or vent post but I m genuinely curious   I m  m and never had a girlfriend  never kissed anyone  never even held hands with a girl  The loneliness and isolation is literally torture and I cry myself to sleep every night   I just want to be in a loving wholesome relationship  I dont care about having sex or swapping partners often or any of that shit  I would be VERY happy with just meeting one person falling in love and spending my life with them   I know allot of guys are not aware when a girl likes them but personally I believe I am a very aware and observant person  Really shy and introverted let s me think and observe things allot and holy shit its fucking sad  The only girl who ever liked me a was a slightly overweight girl in middle school that I didnt feel the same for  Honestly the fact that she had a crush on me is keeping me going on the slim hope that someone can love me   Objectively speaking I would be considered ugly I think  I m short for a guy  have a big nose  and have a receding hairline   Fuck genetics  I m not overweight and go to the gym   days a week so I am fit  And if I look in the mirror I dont think I m ugly but that fact only one girl has liked me in   years says otherwise It fucking sucks because I think I m a good person at least  very thoughtful and caring and loving deep conversation and connecting with others  I believe I get along with others really good as well   I would LOVE to be their for someone  To provide love and affection  To spend time and bond with someone  To have a family would make me so happy   I feel so alone and these   months of lockdown in the U S has made it even worse   I just want to be loved for fucks sake
